TopicTitle: Contracts window scale resets when reverting to VAB

Articles.Content:
I play on a HDTV and have to scale the UI to be able to read anything,

so far so good, but the contract windows seem to reset as soon as i revert to VAB or change scenes in general.

If anyone could point me in the right direction on how to solve or bypass this bug. Or even a confirmation that it is not only happening on my install,

that would be great.
This is happening to me as well, but for my entire UI scale
